participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective with a creative streak. Enjoys exploring new ideas and experiences.
participant_1.background: My dream in life is to work from home. I faint at the sight of blood. I dye my hair every three months. I went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and driven, with a strong analytical mindset. Enjoys networking and discussing future opportunities.
participant_2.background: I plan to go to business school next year. I graduated from Yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. My parents are very wealthy bankers. I grew up in Manhattan.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for work?
I'm a student, but I plan to go to business school next year.
Oh, that's interesting! I'm actually a former pre-vet student myself. I realized I hated seeing blood, so I switched to business.
Oh, really? That's so funny! I wanted to be a vet at one point too, but I couldn't handle the sight of blood either.
Yeah, it's not for everyone. What are you planning to do after business school?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about working in investment banking or consulting.
Oh, cool! Those are both great options. I'm sure you'll do great.
So, what's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to go out to dinner and try new restaurants. I also love to travel.
Oh, me too! I love trying new food and seeing new places.
Me too! I'm actually planning a trip to Europe next summer.
Oh, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Europe.
You should definitely go! It's so beautiful there.
I know, I know! I'm going to make it happen one day.
